0;font-size:.25em}.wc-date-row{padding:5px;font-size:1em}.wc-my-sec{padding:5px 0}.timepicker-true .wc-my-sec{padding:15px 3px}.wc-month-row{padding:10px 0 0;font-size:.4em}.wc-year-row{padding:0;font-size:.3em}.month-year{font-size:14px;line-height:20px;cursor:pointer}.wc-next,.wc-prev{font-size:18px}.wc-details{padding:15px 30px}.year-title{font-size:16px;line-height:40px}.year-title i{padding:11px 10px 10px 0;font-size:18px}.calendar-header td{padding:0!important}.winkel-calendar table{font-size:14px}.winkel-calendar table td span{display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center;width:27px;height:27px;margin:auto;line-height:27px}.months-view,.years-view{top:40px;width:100%;height:calc(100%)}.banner-true 0;font-weight:400;text-align:left}.cuppa-btn-group{display:inline-flex}.cuppa-btn-group>.active{color:#fff!important;background:#ff7800!important}.cuppa-btn-group>.button{align-items:initial;float:left;width:auto;margin:0;padding:5px 10px;color:#ff7800;background:#fff;border:1px solid #ff7800;border-radius:3px}.cuppa-btn-group>.button:first-child{border-right:0;border-top-right-radius:0;border-bottom-right-radius:0}.cuppa-btn-group>.button:last-child{border-top-left-radius:0;border-bottom-left-radius:0}.slider{position:relative;width:200px;height:5px;margin:12px auto;background:#ccc;border-radius:5px}.slider>.circle{position:absolute;top:-8px;left:60px;width:20px;height:20px;background:#fff;border-radius:20px;box-shadow:0 0 5px #ccc;cursor:pointer}input[type=number]{-moz-appearance:textfield}input[type=number]::-webkit-inner-spin-button,input[type=number]::-webkit-outer-spin-button{margin:0;-webkit-appearance:none}.range-highlight{background:#f2f2f2}.clock-icon{display:none;color:#ff7800;text-align:center}.time-close{position:absolute;top:15px;right:15px;cursor:pointer}.util-list{float:left;margin:0;padding:0;list-style:none}.util-list li{float:left;padding:5px}.util-list li a{color:#007bff;cursor:pointer}.util-list li a:hover{color:#14569d;text-decoration:underline}.calendar-week{margin-top:5px}.calendar-week:first-child{margin-top:0}.evo-date-picker__button{width:250px;height:44px;margin:15px auto
